title: An Act relative to a CHIA analysis of co-pays for mental and behavioral health services

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Adam J. Scanlon that the Center for Health Information and Analysis be authorized to conduct an analysis of eliminating or capping co-pays for mental and behavioral health services.  Health Care Financing.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Health Care Financing

related_entities.name: the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Health Care Financing

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 01/15/2026 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1
